New Records: Georgia earned its first-ever point at a major tournament in a 1-1 draw with the Czech Republic at Euro 2024.
Key Match Events: Video reviews were in the spotlight as the Czechs had a goal for Adam Hlozek disallowed for hand ball.
Georges Mikautadze scored a penalty given for hand ball by Czech defender Robin Hranec.
Patrik Schick scored with his chest after a header rebounded off the post.
Saba Lobjanidze shot narrowly over the bar with the last kick of the game on a counterattack.
